page.title: 17A popular game at school
page.content: A popular form of recreation at Greatworth School is "Donkey". You need the following equipment to play this game: A tennis ball and a wall - a friend would be nice You take the tennis ball in your hand and face the wall,about 2 metres away. You throw the ball at the wall and try to jump over the ball as it lands on the playground.Your friend has to catch the ball as it bouncies from the playground. It is then their turn to throw the ball at the wall and you stand behind them waiting to catch it. If you fail to jump the ball you are given a letter from the word Donkey. The person who spells the word Donkey first has lost the game.
